channel.title: Diego Velázquez on Artangled

item.title: Rembrandt-Velázquez - Dutch & Spanish Masters | Rijksmuseum
item.description: Talk about star power! Not since Etre moderne, a “best of MoMA” show that took over the Fondation Louis Vuitton in late 2017 while the iconic New York museum was being renovated, have I experienced such concentrated artistic fame in a standalone exhibition. The concept is simple: a pair of Spanish and Dutch 17th century masterworks, thematically linked, are placed side by side on each wall, in a kind of Godzilla vs Mothra of Baroque mastery.
